name: Party Pals - Online 3D Platformer Prototype
description:
Online only works with same region (for the most part) You can wear hats. Mario 64 ish inspired moveset. Controlls: - WASD: Move
- CTRL: Crouch
- SHIFT: Dash
- SPACEBAR: Jump
- MIDDLE MOUSE: Shoulder Cam This is just a old little prototype that was a bit too ambitious for me to make by myself, but still fun to goof around in.
